laboratory_examinations.findings: Numerous diverticula of the sigmoid colon with bowel wall thickening. A left pelvic fluid collection previously measured 3 cm has almost resolved, now a tiny residual fluid focus of 1.1 cm is present at the prior fluid collection site. Trace fluid in the pelvis is unchanged.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: A left pelvic fluid collection that had previously measured 3 cm has almost resolved since the prior exam.
